attributes.title: It really is cursed
attributes.review: Well gosh Dangit folks, the second I downloaded this app, my house done did caught on fire. I wish I could disregard all these conspiracy theories, but it really do be cursed.

attributes.title: Gen Z, thank you
attributes.review: As a part of gen z, I take part in the movement of taking down this app so therefor I’m giving it a bad review so that apple will take the app down.

attributes.title: The orange🍊
attributes.review: The worst app, as soon as I opened the app I had an urge to throw up🤢. Not only that, but angry fairies started attacking me😡🧚. This app needs to be taken down before we get hurt!!!

i was so disappointed. just so disappointed. the colours made my head hurt and it made my orange juice taste like tooth paste. i hate this app. it’s all about donald jenius trump. like for what. i was expecting donald duck and was just really dissatisfied when it was the president. i would like to say, please download and leave a bad review. i hate it. trump 2020 💅🍃 on a tombstone 🥰💿 muah

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: Maybe he should spend more time trying to build equality than building apps or tweeting nonsense

attributes.title: This app was so bad😢
attributes.review: This was such a bad app! Such a shame, I had to delete it the second I got it. It was so slow and kept spamming 😫. A disappointment!

attributes.title: Disgusted.
attributes.review: This app was completely invasive when asking for my information! I’m completely upset. I guess I have to vote Biden now ! Ugh 😡

attributes.title: Worst Campaign app ever!
attributes.review: I’ve seen other campaign apps and this is the worst one it’s so disorganized and hard to use I would NOT recommend

attributes.title: horrible 😡😵
attributes.review: i downloaded this to see all the bad things about trump in order to be informed on his current situations. once i opened the app i started to cough uncontrollably over the stench that came from my phone. then i got an error saying the app was too bad for my phone to run. don’t download this please.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Straight up trash, horrible app, would not recommend, all this man does is press lies just to get votes nothing more than that.
